text: Property of the Republic () is a 1971 Soviet adventure movie directed by Vladimir Bychkov.Высокий статус культуры – признак самостоятельности государстваДОСТОЯНИЕ РЕСПУБЛИКИ (1971) It stars Oleg Tabakov, Andrei Mironov, and Vitya Galkin. == Actors == * Oleg Tabakov as Makar Ovchinnikov * Andrei Mironov as Shilovsky aka Marquis * Vitya Galkin as homeless Keshka * Yevgeniy Yevstigneyev as Carl Genrikhovich Vitol * Spartak Mishulin as Ilya Tarakanov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1971 adventure movies Category:Soviet adventure movies
title: Property of the Republic
